testcase.name: Verify that user can add one product to cart with index
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed Given "Products" page is open...............................................passed When I add product with index 2 in the cart.................................passed Then I see that the shopping cart badge should show 1 item..................passed When I click on "shoppingCart" button.......................................passed Then I verify that the correct product should be in the cart................passed
